title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-1.7 - Panel members
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-1.7 - Panel members

State Regulations
(a) The
commissioner shall maintain a list of persons eligible to serve as panel
members pursuant to Education Law, section 3020-a(3)(b)(iv), which list shall
be updated as necessary. (b) Copies
of such list of panel members appointed by the commissioner shall be available
for public inspection upon request to the commissioner. (c) No person may be selected from a list to
serve as a panel member when that person is serving as a panel member in
connection with charges being heard against another employee, except with the
consent of the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
82-1.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
